attributes.action: Give public vote on accepting the deal government negotiates or leaving no deal.
attributes.additional_details: Many people have been calling for a referendum on the final deal (mps from all parties among other public figures) and they have a point. The government saw fit to allow direct public involvement and this is the best way to ensure there is public support for the final deal. People voted to leave its now time to ensure we don't leave in a manner that is unsatisfactory to the majority of the British Public.
attributes.background: The public should have the final say in the outcome of Brexit negotiations. The choice should be between accepting what the government negotiates and leaving without a deal. This choice respects the outcome of the original referendum doesn't represent a rerun nor an attempt to subvert the original.
